column1:

column2:

column1:
These settings need to be set on store view level. Please switch to the right scope (top left) and set these values. You will need to repeat this for all your store views. Read more

",

These settings need to be set on store view level. Please switch to the right scope (top left) and set these values. You will need to repeat this for all your store views. Read more

""

To ensure that your content is catered towards the correct audience, there are two methods to do so, depending on how your webshop is set up. Users can be targeted based on language or region. Please set the correct language tag under "Hreflang Tag:". For more information about targeting languages and region, please visit our knowledge base
column2: Om ervoor te zorgen dat de bezoeker wordt verwezen naar de juiste content is het belangrijk om dit goed in te stellen. Er zijn er twee manieren om dit te doen, dit is afhankelijk van hoe de webshop is opgezet. Gebruikers kunnen worden getarget op basis van taal of regio. Stel deze juiste taal tag onder "hreflang Tag:". Voor meer informatie over targeting talen en regio, kunt u terecht op onze knowledge base

column1:
Production/Live License Key
Make sure the shown license server below is matching your license server in your license key overview.
Whenever it shows a invalid license key you can compare the license server name with the domain in your license dashboard to make sure it's correct. You can change the live key one time.

Change or Add a Staging/Development Keys
If you need an extra license key for your staging/development environment you can login to your account and generate development/staging keys. Read more information about the licenses.

"
column2:
Production/Live Licentie Key
Make sure the shown license server below is matching your license server in your license key overview.
Whenever it shows a invalid license key you can compare the license server name with the domain in your license dashboard to make sure it's correct. You can change the live key one time.

Change or Add a Staging/Development Keys
If you need an extra license key for your staging/development environment you can login to your account and generate development/staging keys. Read more information about the licenses.

column1: You can find your provided license key on your order confirmation mail or login to your account on Magmodules.eu and go to the my license keys tab.
column2: You can find your provided license key on your order confirmation mail or login to your account on Magmodules.eu and go to the my license keys tab.
